data.title: Customer Service, Tech Support & Department Contacts
data.meta_description: Contact Xerox for sales, customer service, technical support & other inquiries. Find all department contact numbers, email addresses & more.
data.text:
Document Support Centre (Pvt) Ltd 168 Samora Machel West Avenue Belvedere Harare Zimbabwe Contact Person: George Chimhini Tel:(+263)(4)741 874-5 Fax: (+263) (4)740 981 sales@dcs.co.zw Kwikmaster (Pvt) Ltd Siemens Building, No. 5 Premium Close, Mt Pleasant Business Park Mt Pleasant Harare Zimbabwe Contact Person: Noble Taruwona Tel: (+263) (242) 708 199 / 336 / 239 / 368 Mobile: (263) 772 893 682noble@kwikmaster.com
